page.title: 08School Yard Games.
page.content: To play{DONKEY}throw a ball at the wall and then jump over it. If you cannot jump over it you are D, when you get all the letters of{DONKEY}you are out. To play {QUEENIE,QUEENIE} somebody stands with their face to the wall and throws the ball over their head to be caught,then everyone hides their hands behind their back and says {"QUEENIE QUEENIE WHO'S GOT THE BALL?" The person who has thrown the ball has to try to guess who has the ball, if they are wrong they are on again. {STUCK IN THE MUD}can be played by any number of people. Someone is the catcher, if you are caught you must stand still,{STUCK IN THE MUD,}until another player crawls under your legs to free you, but if the catcher is near, you can say, "Halfies" or "No Guardies", and they must go away. When everyone is stuck another person is on
